title: A letter vvritten by a true Christian Catholike, to a Romaine pretended Catholike Wherein vppon occasion of controuersie touching the Catholike Church the 12. 13. and 14. Chap. of the Reuelations are breifly and trulie expounded. Which conteine the true estate thereof, from the birth of Christ, to the end of the world.
author: Herbert, William, Sir, 1553?-1593.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Iohn Windet dwelling in Adling streete at the signe of the white beare, neere Baynards Castle,
